title: Breaking News & Betting Hockey
description:
Welcome back to another episode of In The Crease! Linda and Emily start off with a bit of breaking news surrounding Evander Kane. Then, Linda recaps her first time reporting from between the benches. Later on, they're joined by ESPN's Senior NHL Writer, Greg Wyshynski who talks about betting on hockey and why it's so difficult.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
itunes:subtitle: Linda and Emily talk about the latest Evander Kane news, betting hockey, and more!
